settings.heading: Keramiek
settings.text_content: Looking for ceramics? I work almost exclusively to order. Feel free to browse my gallery or Instagram account . See something you like? Great! Send me a message, and we'll discuss exactly what you're looking for. Keep in mind that I love custom work. Larger, smaller, or with a personal touch? If your idea aligns with my style, anything is possible. Glazing is my passion. There are countless color options. I have plenty of samples in my studio that you're welcome to view. I'll then be happy to prepare a custom quote for you. Afterward, I'll start processing your order as soon as possible. I'll clearly state the delivery time in the quote.
